pageContext.course_type_long_description: Level up your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGOÂ® parts! Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through engineer-designed projects such as: Gear Cars, Castles, Airplanes, and Scissor Lifts. Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. There are no prerequisites for this course.
pageContext.action_url_comment: Registration is handled by the YMCA.  Students must enroll for a full day course at the YMCA to participate.
